resources.name: United Way Veterans & Active Duty Services
resources.description: United Way Greater Houston's Veterans & Active Duty initiative supports service members, veterans, and their families through partnerships with Combined Arms and local veteran service organizations. Services include employment assistance, housing support, and connection to community resources.
resources.eligibility: Veterans, active-duty service members, and their families in the Greater Houston area.

resources.name: Combined Arms Houston
resources.description: Combined Arms is a Texas-founded nonprofit that connects veterans to a collaborative network of 140+ organizations providing employment, education, health, housing, and legal services. Their technology platform enables real-time referrals and tracks veteran outcomes.
resources.eligibility: Veterans and military families in Texas, with primary focus on Houston metro area.
resources.how_to_apply: Call 713-942-2935 or visit combinedarms.us to create an account and connect with services.
